name: Tamago (Celta02, LittleHootini, iHeartDoogle, Jellie.beam)
description: A beaver needs to build their home , collect and grow your dam to make it comfortable enough for the coming seasons. Beware of what comes down the river as it might just be strong enough to break through your walls! Defend and press the buttons that come up to break what will damage your home to the beat.
